curam.util.jmx

Class NumericCounterStatisticsAggregator

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.jmx.NumericCounterStatisticsAggregator

  • public class NumericCounterStatisticsAggregator
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class that holds and aggregates statistics for a positive numeric counter. Note that this class uses atomic variables and it should be used only when a large enough sample is expected in order for the calculated values to be a good approximation of the actual values.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public boolean add(long sample)
        Adds a sample. Note that sample must be positive.
        Parameters:
        sample - the positive value to add
        Returns:
        true if statistics have been reset due to Long.MAX_VALUE overflow
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if sample is a negative number

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets all values.

        Returns:
